attributes.action: To keep children back a year at school to due to the current situation
attributes.background: Due to the current lock down of covid 19 our children have missed out almost a year of education and not being in there class rooms I feel all children the whole nation should be held back a year to help them progress catch up on what they have missed as they are the next generation

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
